fields.name: Leather Dice Bag - Blue
fields.description: Forged in the hue of a clear midnight sky, this pouch feels as though it was stitched from the very cloak of a storm-sorcerer. It is the perfect vessel for dice that carry the chill of frost or the crackle of lightning.
fields.product_dimensions: 12.5 cm x 10 cm - holding approximately 35 dice

fields.name: Canvas Dice Bag - Brown
fields.description: Woven from the thick, sun-bleached fibers of a seasoned traveler’s tent. This rugged pouch is built to withstand the grit of the road, keeping your dice dry and secure whether you are trekking through mud-slicked lowlands or dusty trade routes.
fields.product_material: 100% Heavy-Duty Cotton Duck Canvas  (Exterior and Interior) / Braided Jute (Drawstring)
fields.product_dimensions: 14 cm x 11 cm - holding approximately 55 dice

fields.name: Velvet Dice Bag - Celestial
fields.description: Woven from threads of captured starlight and midnight silk, this pouch hums with the quiet energy of the cosmos. It is the favored vessel for those who draw their power from the heavens or seek to influence the very threads of fate.
fields.product_dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

fields.name: Velvet Dice Bag - Stag
fields.description: Embossed with the image of the Great Forest King, this emerald-toned velvet bag carries the scent of pine and ancient magic. It is a noble choice for the warden or druid who views their dice as sacred seeds of destiny.
fields.product_dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

fields.name: Velvet Dice Bag - Dragon
fields.description: Clad in the regal texture of a Great Wyrm’s underbelly, this pouch is designed to protect a hoard of any size. It carries an air of ancient power, perfect for the player who intends to dominate the battlefield with fire and fury.
fields.product_dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

fields.name: Velvet Dice Bag - Illithid
fields.description: A pouch that seems to shimmer with a strange, oily iridescence, reminiscent of the depths of the Underdark. It is a chilling home for dice that deal in psychic whispers and secrets best left unspoken.
fields.product_dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

fields.name: Leather Dice Bag - Kharki
fields.description: This rugged hide bears the weathered tone of the high mountain trails. Built for the long haul, it is an essential piece of kit for the scout or wanderer who needs their lucky stones to stay silent and secure while trekking through the brush.
fields.product_dimensions: 12.5 cm x 10 cm - holding approximately 35 dice

fields.name: Leather Dice Bag - Brown
fields.description: A classic relic of the Old World, this bag smells of ancient libraries and tavern hearths. Its rich, earthen leather is a staple for any seasoned adventurer, looking better with every battle scar and gold coin it carries.
fields.product_dimensions: 12.5 cm x 10 cm - holding approximately 35 dice

fields.name: Velvet Dice Bag - Moon and Stars
fields.description: Adorned with the silver icons of the night sky, this velvet bag serves as a tiny sanctuary for your dice. It feels as soft as a cloud and is said to grant a lunar blessing to any roll made in the dark of night.
fields.product_dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

fields.name: Velvet Dice Bag - Funghi
fields.description: Sprouting from the damp corners of an enchanted grove, this whimsical bag is a tribute to the strange magic of the earth. It is the perfect home for dice that carry the unpredictable and transformative power of nature.
fields.product_dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

fields.name: Velvet Dice Bag - Owl
fields.description: Soft as a silent wingbeat in the dark, this bag is a tribute to the keepers of hidden knowledge. It is ideal for the wizard or scholar whose dice are as sharp and discerning as a raptor's gaze.
fields.product_dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

fields.name: Leather Dice Bag - Slate Grey
fields.description: Cool and elusive as the morning mist over the Shadowfell, this pouch is designed for those who move unseen. Its neutral, stony finish ensures that while your rolls might be legendary, your presence remains a mystery.
fields.product_dimensions: 12.5 cm x 10 cm - holding approximately 35 dice

fields.name: Canvas Dice Bag - Cotton White
fields.description: This pouch is crafted from heavy, bleached sailcloth, reminiscent of the great ships that traverse the Uncharted Seas. It is a clean, sturdy vessel for a cleric’s holy relics or a navigator’s most trusted star-charts—and the dice that guide their way.
fields.product_material: 100% Heavy-Duty Cotton Duck Canvas  (Exterior and Interior) / Braided Jute (Drawstring)
fields.product_dimensions: 14 cm x 11 cm - holding approximately 55 dice

fields.name: Aged Bronze Dice
fields.description: Heavy with the weight of centuries, these dice look like relics recovered from a sunken trireme, their patina telling tales of forgotten empires.
fields.product_material: 95% Zinc Alloy, 5% Electroplated Finish (Antique or High-Gloss)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 130g per set

fields.name: Dusty Coal Dice
fields.description: Matte and dark as a dragon-slayer’s forge, these dice are forged from the pressurized remains of ancient forests, carrying a smoldering, silent intensity.
fields.product_material: 95% Zinc Alloy, 5% Electroplated Finish (Antique or High-Gloss)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 130g per set

fields.name: Night Sky Dice
fields.description: Deep indigo shards flecked with distant silver, these dice carry the vast, silent majesty of the midnight heavens in the palm of your hand.
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Copper Coins Dice
fields.description: Gleaming with the humble pride of a merchant's guild, these dice ring with the sound of a well-earned reward and the promise of a filled purse.
fields.product_material: 95% Zinc Alloy, 5% Electroplated Finish (Antique or High-Gloss)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 130g per set

fields.name: Verdant Forest Dice
fields.description: Polished stones plucked from the heart of an ancient, moss-covered glade, these dice hum with the vibrant, leafy energy of a world in perpetual spring.
fields.product_material: 100% Epoxy Resin (with internal pigment and foil inclusions)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Golden Coins Dice
fields.description: Radiant and opulent, these dice are the literal manifestation of a king’s ransom, shimmering with the greed and glory of a dragon’s treasure hoard.
fields.product_material: 95% Zinc Alloy, 5% Electroplated Finish (Antique or High-Gloss)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 130g per set

fields.name: Swamp Dice
fields.description: Veined with the murky greens and deep browns of a stagnant bayou, these dice are as treacherous and unpredictable as the shifting peat of a hag’s marsh.
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Moss Dice
fields.description: Soft, earthy, and ancient, these dice look as though they have been reclaimed by the forest floor, perfect for a druid who draws power from the quiet growth of the wild.
fields.product_material: 95% Zinc Alloy, 5% Electroplated Finish (Antique or High-Gloss)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 130g per set

fields.name: Elvish Emerald Dice
fields.description: Flawless and crystalline, these dice are master-crafted by sylvan smiths to reflect the eternal light of the Undying Lands.
fields.product_material: 100% Epoxy Resin (with internal pigment and foil inclusions)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Endless Night Dice
fields.description: Solid, obsidian-black dice that seem to swallow the light around them; they are the preferred tool for assassins and those who walk the path of shadow.
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Snowstorm Dice
fields.description: Gnarled and thick with history, this roller feels as though it was hewn from the oldest tree in the world. It carries the heavy, earthen spirit of the woods into every roll.
fields.product_material: 100% Epoxy Resin (with internal pigment and foil inclusions)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Nebula Dice
fields.description: A swirling vortex of cosmic purples and cosmic pinks, these dice are birthed from the heart of a dying star, crackling with raw, unbridled arcane energy.
fields.product_material: 100% Epoxy Resin (with internal pigment and foil inclusions)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Fire and Soot  Dice
fields.description: Swirled with the angry orange of a stoked hearth and the black ash of a burnt village, these dice carry the destructive spirit of the flame.
fields.product_material: 100% Epoxy Resin (with internal pigment and foil inclusions)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Shadowfell Mist Dice
fields.description: These dice are translucent and ghostly, appearing as though they were carved from the very fog that haunts the border between life and death.
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Stardust Orchid Dice
fields.description: A magical blend of floral pink and celestial violet, these dice sparkle with the glitter of a thousand crushed stars, favored by bards and fey-touched souls.
fields.product_material: 100% Epoxy Resin (with internal pigment and foil inclusions)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Dragons Blood Dice
fields.description: Deep, viscous crimson dice that pulse with the latent fury of a wounded drake, perfect for those whose rage knows no bounds.
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Hellfire Dice
fields.description: These dice shimmer with an infernal heat, their dark core surrounded by licks of brimstone orange, birthed in the deepest pits of the Nine Hells.
fields.product_material: 100% Epoxy Resin (with internal pigment and foil inclusions)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Silver Coins Dice
fields.description: Bright and sharp as a moonbeam, these dice carry the purity of refined silver, often sought after by those who hunt the creatures of the night.
fields.product_material: 95% Zinc Alloy, 5% Electroplated Finish (Antique or High-Gloss)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 130g per set

fields.name: Starburst Dice
fields.description: Radiant and explosive, these dice capture the blinding flash of a supernova, designed for those who wish to illuminate the darkest dungeons with a single roll.
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Dragons Gold Dice
fields.description: A swirling mix of metallic amber and molten gold, these dice represent the singular obsession of the Great Wyrms—power, wealth, and immortality.
fields.product_material: 100% Epoxy Resin (with internal pigment and foil inclusions)
fields.product_dimensions: D20 - 20mm, D12 - 18mm, D10 & D00 - 16mm, D8 - 16mm, D6 - 16mm, D4 - 18mm. Weight: 30g per set

fields.name: Belltower Dice Roller
fields.description: A soaring spire that echoes with the gravity of fate. As your dice tumble through its heights, imagine the distant tolling of a bronze bell announcing a champion's victory or a hero's fall.
fields.product_dimensions: 16cm(H)x6.5cm(W)x6.5cm(D)

fields.name: Crumbling Castle Dice Roller
fields.description: This weathered stone fortress has stood against a thousand sieges. Rolling your dice through its cracked ramparts feels like a desperate gambit during a final stand for the kingdom.
fields.product_dimensions: 14cm(H)x9cm(W)x8cm(D)

fields.name: Dragons Lair Dice Roller
fields.description: Cast your dice into the smoking maw of a Great Wyrm’s sanctum. Only those with a true dragon’s hoard of luck will emerge from this scorched stone passage with a critical success.
fields.product_dimensions: 14cm(H)x9cm(W)x8cm(D)

fields.name: Elvish Tree Dice Roller
fields.description: Carved from living wood and infused with Sylvan magic, this roller guides your dice through a labyrinth of silver-leafed branches. It is the favored tool of those who walk the path of the High Forest.
fields.product_dimensions: 17cm(H)x8cm(W)x8cm(D)

fields.name: Lighthouse Dice Roller
fields.description: A beacon of hope in the storm of battle. This roller provides a steady, guiding path for your dice, cutting through the fog of war to reveal the numbers you need most
fields.product_dimensions: 14cm(H)x9cm(W)x8cm(D)

fields.name: Pagoda Dice Roller
fields.description: A structure of elegant balance and ancient wisdom. It offers a tranquil and disciplined descent for your dice, perfect for the monk or strategist who values precision over brute force.
fields.product_dimensions: 15cm(H)x8.5cm(W)x8.5cm(D)

fields.name: Temple of Doom Dice Roller
fields.description: Dangerous and shrouded in mystery, this roller represents a descent into cursed ruins. Every die that passes through its shadowed halls feels like a narrow escape from a deadly ancient trap.
fields.product_dimensions: 15cm(H)x8.5cm(W)x8.5cm(D)

fields.name: Tower Dice Roller
fields.description: The quintessential bastion of the arcane. This classic stone tower provides a reliable and authoritative tumble, making every roll feel like a decree from a high-seated wizard.
fields.product_dimensions: 14cm(H)x9cm(W)x8cm(D)

fields.name: Ancient Oak Dice Roller
fields.description: Gnarled and thick with history, this roller feels as though it was hewn from the oldest tree in the world. It carries the heavy, earthen spirit of the woods into every roll.
fields.product_dimensions: 17cm(H)x8cm(W)x8cm(D)

fields.name: Celestial Wooden Dice Box
fields.description: Encased in polished wood, this vault features intricate carvings of the sun, moon, and stars, designed to hold dice that command the very forces of the cosmos.
fields.product_material: 100% Natural Hardwood (Acacia, Rosewood, or Mango Wood depending on grain) / Zinc Alloy (Hinges & Latches)
fields.product_dimensions: Dimensions (External): 9.5cm(H)x3.2cm(W)x3.2cm(D). Dimensions (Internal Trench): 8.8cm(L)x2.5cm(W)

fields.name: Celtic Knot Wooden Dice Box
fields.description: A masterwork of traditional craftsmanship, this box is adorned with eternal interlocking patterns that offer a protective ward over your rolls.
fields.product_material: 100% Natural Hardwood (Acacia, Rosewood, or Mango Wood depending on grain) / Zinc Alloy (Hinges & Latches)
fields.product_dimensions: Dimensions (External): 9.5cm(H)x3.2cm(W)x3.2cm(D). Dimensions (Internal Trench): 8.8cm(L)x2.5cm(W)

fields.name: Lion Hearted Wooden Dice Box
fields.description: Bearing the fierce and noble visage of a roaring lion, this sturdy chest is built for the warrior whose courage never falters under the pressure of a critical roll.
fields.product_material: 100% Natural Hardwood (Acacia, Rosewood, or Mango Wood depending on grain) / Zinc Alloy (Hinges & Latches)
fields.product_dimensions: Dimensions (External): 9.5cm(H)x3.2cm(W)x3.2cm(D). Dimensions (Internal Trench): 8.8cm(L)x2.5cm(W)
